name: Business, Management & Support Functions
description: Driving organizational success through strategic leadership, operations, and support services.

subRoles.name: Business Analyst
subRoles.shortDescription: Analyzes business processes and recommends improvements to drive efficiency and growth.
subRoles.longDescription: Business analysts evaluate business operations, processes, and systems to identify opportunities for improvement. They work with stakeholders to gather requirements, analyze data, and recommend solutions that enhance business performance.

typicalDay: Meet with stakeholders to understand business needs
Create process flow diagrams and documentation
Collaborate with technical teams on implementation

subRoles.potential: Versatile career with opportunities in every industry. Strong demand for professionals who can bridge business and technology.

subRoles.name: Product Manager
subRoles.shortDescription: Defines product strategy and leads cross-functional teams to deliver successful products.
subRoles.longDescription: Product managers are responsible for the strategy, roadmap, and feature definition of a product or product line. They work with engineering, design, marketing, and sales teams to bring products to market.

subRoles.name: Operations Manager
subRoles.shortDescription: Oversees day-to-day business operations to ensure efficiency and effectiveness.
subRoles.longDescription: Operations managers plan, direct, and coordinate the operations of public or private sector organizations. They develop policies and strategies to improve operational efficiency and productivity.
